column5: me and my cousin went out today.  we hit a bay from the ottawa river.  the plan was from 1pm to 4 pm!  the pike were ON!  we managed to land 5 and missed about 3 good hit. you know the type where the spool is going off and you set the hook ... NOHTING! ....  3 lbs pike .    my cousin with a nice rocket!    we are about to call it a day when my tip up slowly goes down.......... down..........i grab the line set the hook a heavy enough fish ....  pulled this out !    it was commin in with the bucket wide open!  couple of perch and that was that!      there was a pike with half a tail ..... the pike told me that he encountered a 45 lbs musky chassing him!       enjoi  24/7
good stuff, somebody tell that bass it is winter! Thanks for the report
Nice pike, and perch man.  Good stuff, thanks for sharing

Great report and pics Kevin  You guys sure got into a good mix bag and that bass looks real nice Serious injury on that pike.... must of been a big old dood in the neighbourhood  Just got back from Lac Leamy and got skunked We saw 2 deers come out near shore close to the parking lot and the second one, was the big boss could not take a pic cause it was too far but man did he ever look big and majestic  Congratulations to both of you for a superb outing Thanks for sharing Jacques
Great report! Well done and thanks for taking the time. Merry Christmas too! Jim
Great report, great pike....superb bass!!!   wow, the perch in our area would rarely hit a jig that large in my experience.   Good job guys, looks like a good day out.
Looked like a good day on the ice !

Nice outing Guys...  Alot more action than Leechman and I had , we tried the night bite for a change , things didn't work out in our favour ,,   Here is a pic of Leechman trying out his new toy    The rest of the time we were out looked like this    Things were at a stand still     Oh well, it was still nice to be out on the Ice
hey whitespinnerbait  i offered you my fishing holes and you didnt take them .....

Hey Simon, remember you asked about tips for bass in some of your local lakes, well here is the weapon of choice for them while jigging, Canadian Wobbler in bronze.... Tip it with the head of a small minnow       Yeah Paul.... It happens to the best of us     Will have better results next time..... Here is a closer look at my new toy with some artillery.... my chrismas gift...  from me to me    and some of the additional items that I have now      Jacques aka Leechman
great day on the river !! congarts on some good lookin' pike ,,and that bucket's  definitely a nice pick-up in the bonus round .

yeah i find that bass are verry fun on the ice they wont take the long runs like a pike but they sure have the weight to them!  you know its a bass on your tip up when it takes 20 - 30 seconds for you tip up to go down....  they just slowly take the minnow and swim away. slow mo!  can you imagine hitting a nickel on the ice!  thanx for the replies and happy xmas and a great new year! to yAll
The very best to you and yours for the holiday season.

Good to see you guys back out there, at least now there will be constasnt reports until Spring to keep me busy.  I hate winter!  I am not surprised you got yourself a largie, afterall you caught a tonne during the year.  Keep it up and looking forward to the next 3amigos report.
